title: With a dire warning, concerns rise about conflict in space with Russia
description: Pentagon officials have warned for years that their satellites are vulnerable to attack.

title: OpenAI shows off life-like videos made with AI
description: The new tool, called “Sora,” will initially only be available to a small group of artists and filmmakers as well as “red teamers,” or researchers who try to find ways that an AI tool can be used for malicious purposes, OpenAI said in an announcement Thursday.

title: Truth Social merger deal wins key approval, a victory for Trump
description: Trump will hold more than 78 million shares in the post-merger company, a filing shows — a stake that, at current prices, would be worth more than $4 billion.

title: Senate poised to pass biggest piece of tech regulation in decades
description: With more than 60 backers, an updated Kids Online Safety Act finally has a path to passage in the Senate but faces uncertainty in the House.

title: How to remotely access a computer and fix your family’s IT problems for free
description: Who among us hasn't occasionally been tapped for tech support? These free tools can make remotely troubleshooting PC problems less of a headache.

title: SpaceX launches a commercial lander to the moon in historic mission
description: The soft lunar landing set for Feb. 22 would be the first by a commercial entity, and the first for the United States since the final Apollo mission in 1972.

title: Elon Musk claims driver in 2022 Tesla crash did not have Full Self-Driving
description: Neither Musk nor Tesla provided evidence of the claim, which came in response to a Washington Post story about the company’s advanced driver-assistance software.
